text: Do not trust all men, but trust men of worth the former course is silly, the latter a mark of prudence.
author: Democritus

text: Men are not punished for their sins, but by them.
author: Kin Hubbard

text: When men and women agree, it is only in their conclusions their reasons are always different.
author: George Santayana

text: Those men get along best with women who can get along best without them.
author: Charles Baudelaire

text: There is no such thing as justice in the abstract it is merely a compact between men.
author: Epicurus
